dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev just handed out some major honors, the Order of Otan and the Order of Barys.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan's President Tokayev just handed out some major honors, the Order of Otan and the Order of Barys.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has awarded Ravil Cherdabayev, a prominent state and public figure, with the Order of Otan, and Serik Tokpanov, an Honored Worker of Kazakhstan, with the Order of Barys 1st degree, according to a statement from Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, to Ravil Cherdabayev and Serik Tokpanov, right? I was reading about that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, to Ravil Cherdabayev and Serik Tokpanov, right? I was reading about that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has awarded Ravil Cherdabayev, a prominent state and public figure, with the Order of Otan, and Serik Tokpanov, an Honored Worker of Kazakhstan, with the Order of Barys 1st degree, according to a statement from Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Cherdabayev got the Order of Otan for his work in oil and gas, diplomacy, even regional governance—talk about a multi-talented guy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Cherdabayev got the Order of Otan for his work in oil and gas, diplomacy, even regional governance-talk about a multi-talented guy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You have made a substantial contribution to the development of the oil and gas sector. As a minister, regional governor, and deputy, you faithfully served the interests of the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he's written scientific papers on oil extraction too! The president quoted that saying, um, "Honor comes through labor."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's written scientific papers on oil extraction too! The president quoted that saying, um, Honor comes through labor.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You are also the author of several scientific works on oil extraction. As the saying goes, 'Enbegimen er sÄ±yly' ('Honor comes through labor').

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously impressive. Meanwhile, Serik Tokpanov—over 50 years in healthcare. They called him a golden-handed surgeon.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously impressive. Meanwhile, Serik Tokpanov-over fifty years in healthcare. They called him a golden-handed surgeon.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President also praised the achievements of Serik Tokpanov, a renowned doctor known as a golden-handed surgeon who has dedicated his life to improving the nation's health. You have worked in healthcare for over 50 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Saved thousands of lives, they said. That's just… wow. Hard to even imagine that level of impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Saved thousands of lives, they said. That's just... wow. Hard to even imagine that level of impact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the years, you've performed complex surgeries and saved thousands of lives, becoming a true symbol of service in healthcare.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. And both of them seemed so humble in their responses too, grateful for the recognition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. And both of them seemed so humble in their responses too, grateful for the recognition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response, Ravil Cherdabayev and Serik Tokpanov expressed their gratitude to the President for being honored with such prestigious state awards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you think about legacy, you know? Contributing to your country in such meaningful ways.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you think about legacy, you know? Contributing to your country in such meaningful ways.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Cherdabayev strengthening statehood, Tokpanov literally saving lives—both models of dedication.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Cherdabayev strengthening statehood, Tokpanov literally saving lives-both models of dedication.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the award ceremony, the President noted that Ravil Cherdabayev is held in high esteem for his active civic engagement and significant contribution to strengthening Kazakhstan's statehood. Over the years, you've performed complex surgeries and saved thousands of lives, becoming a true symbol of service in healthcare.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I love that the awards highlight such different but equally vital fields. Energy and health—both pillars for the nation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I love that the awards highlight such different but equally vital fields. Energy and health-both pillars for the nation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And the ceremony sounded heartfelt; the president's words weren't just formalities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And the ceremony sounded heartfelt; the president's words weren't just formalities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, you could tell it was personal praise, not just a script. That matters.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, you could tell it was personal praise, not just a script. That matters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely sets a standard, like he said—inspiration for the next generation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely sets a standard, like he said-inspiration for the next generation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Your career is a model for the younger generation," said Tokayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes me want to achieve something worth honoring one day, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes me want to achieve something worth honoring one day, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Same here. What a moment for both of them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Same here. What a moment for both of them.
